title: The Dangers of a Controlling Spouse
itunes:author: Guests: Dr. Ron & Mrs. Jan Welch
itunes:summary:
As you're getting to know your spouse, it's easy for things to come up that you weren't expecting. John talks with Greg and Erin about struggles they overcame in their marriage. They'll also provide hope for those who feel stuck in a controlling relationship.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Get the book "10 Choices Successful Couples Make" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-04-15?refcd=1089709

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/the-dangers-of-a-controlling-spouse/

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
